title: Iceland Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Iceland decreased to 242.24 percent in 2021 from 265.97 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Iceland averaged 273.02 percent from 2003 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 378.37 percent in 2014 and a record low of 219.22 percent in 2019. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
